traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The scaleshield can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scaleshield makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

actions.name: Morningstar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spiked Shield
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
